metadata.Description: Government agencies responsible for collecting and analyzing statistical data.

entities.Description: Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
The analysis of energy data to gain insights and inform decision-making in the energy sector.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.

relations.Description: National statistical offices collect and address energy access data to inform policy decisions and improve energy access.

relations.Description: National statistical offices employ energy analysts to analyze energy data and provide insights for sustainable energy planning.

relations.Description: National statistical offices collaborate with research institutions to conduct studies on energy consumption and trends.

relations.Description: National statistical offices support energy efficiency programs by providing data and insights for program development and evaluation.
relations.Subject: national statistical offices

relations.Description: National statistical offices administer energy surveys to gather data on energy consumption and usage patterns.
relations.Subject: national statistical offices

relations.Description: National statistical offices measure renewable energy capacity to track progress towards sustainable energy goals.
relations.Subject: national statistical offices

relations.Description: National statistical offices align their energy data collection and reporting with the Sustainable Development Goals.

energy data analytics
relations.Description: Energy data analytics implements the Energy Efficiency Policy to optimize energy consumption and reduce waste.

relations.Subject: energy data analytics
relations.Description: Energy data analytics focuses on analyzing data related to renewable energy sources to identify trends and opportunities.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: energy storage
relations.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

relations.Subject: renewable energy certificates
relations.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.
